## ProgressBarComponent.setValue() method

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

| Parameter          | Type                | Description                                 |
| ------------------ | ------------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| <code>value</code> | <code>number</code> | The progress amount, a value between 0-100. |
